languages.text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а также уменьшает число {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на 1. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Each stack grants a −10 penalty to any Strength, Toughness, and Agility tests and −1 movement point. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

languages.text: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und -1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Der Effekt wird am Ende des Kampfes entfernt. Wurdest du außerhalb des Kampfes damit belegt, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und -1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Der Effekt wird am Ende des Kampfes entfernt. Wurdest du außerhalb des Kampfes damit belegt, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

Jeder Stapel verursacht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkt{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erhalten worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

languages.text: Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, et réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de −1. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. Si l'effet est obtenu hors combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour l'annuler.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, et réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de −1. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. Si l'effet est obtenu hors combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour l'annuler.

Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, et réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de −1. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. Si l'effet est obtenu hors combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour l'annuler.

languages.text: 每层效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低1点。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低1点。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

languages.text: Cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y reduce los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en −1. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y reduce los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en −1. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

languages.text: 1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}に−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が−1減少する。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}判定に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が-1される。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。

1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}に−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が−1減少する。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а также уменьшает число {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на 1. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а также −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очко передвижения{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а также −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очко передвижения{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

languages.text: Her birikim; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliklerine −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'yi 1 azaltır. Bu etki, çatışmanın sonunda kalkar. Etkiye çatışma dışında maruz kalındıysa, gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
